channel.title: Foxx CLI on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Foxx CLI on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: Foxx CLI Details
item.description: Install foxx-cli runs on Node.js  and can be installed with yarn : yarn global add foxx-cli Or with npm : npm install --global foxx-cli Note: using yarn you can also run foxx-cli from your project’s devDependencies: yarn add --dev foxx-cli yarn foxx help If you’re using a recent version of npm you can also use npx: npx -p foxx-cli foxx help Usage After you’ve installed foxx-cli, you should be able to use the foxx program.
